title: Migrate etanheyman.com secrets to 1Password
description: Create a 'portfolio' vault in 1Password and migrate etanheyman.com .env.local secrets to use op:// references. This follows the pattern established in US-100/US-101 for the main projects.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Check if RESEND_API_KEY, NEXTAUTH_SECRET, UPLOADTHING_TOKEN, OPTIMIZE_API_KEY exist in Development vault
If not in Development: create 'portfolio' vault in 1Password
Add secrets to appropriate vault with proper item names
Update etanheyman.com/.env.local to use op:// references
Verify secrets resolve correctly with 'op inject'
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: feat: US-114 migrate etanheyman.com to 1Password
